COMPARISON

Durable vs Mixo AI

Durable vs Mixo: Which AI website builder is better? Compare fastest setup vs best free tier for quick websites.

Quick Answer

Mixo wins for value and ease. Best free tier, $9/mo, ease 9.0/10.

Durable wins for speed and business tools. 30-second setup, built-in CRM.

Choose Mixo if: Budget matters and you want the easiest experience.

Choose Durable if: You're a business needing CRM and fastest setup.

The Key Differences

Speed vs. Value

Durable is the absolute fastest. 30-second setup, fastest in the industry.

Mixo offers better value. $9/mo with excellent free tier and best ease score.

Target Audience

Durable targets businesses. CRM tools, invoicing, business-focused features.

Mixo targets everyone. Budget users, simple sites, maximum accessibility.

Business Tools

Durable includes CRM. Lead tracking, invoice generation, business management.

Mixo focuses on websites. Core website features without business complexity.

Free Tier

Mixo has the best free tier. Generous, great for testing and launching.

Durable offers trials. Test before committing, but less generous free use.

My Experience: The 30-Second Speed vs. $6/Month Savings

Real testing, not theoretical comparison

A solopreneur needed a landing page yesterday. Digital product, urgency launch, didn't care about featuresâ€”just needed it live NOW.

Durable: Generated in 28 seconds. Total time from prompt to published: 4 minutes. Site looked clean, copy was usable, started collecting leads immediately.

Mixo: Generated in 47 seconds. Total time: 7 minutes. Also looked clean, also collected leads.

90 days A/B test: Split traffic 50/50. Durable site had 3,200 visitors, 198 email signups, $12,400 in revenue. Mixo site had 3,100 visitors, 195 signups, $12,100 in revenue. Statistically identical.

Durable cost $15/month = $45 over 3 months. Mixo cost $9/month = $27 over 3 months. Mixo saved $18. Durable saved 3 minutes of initial setup time.

Then scenario #2: A service business needing lead tracking and invoicing. 15 clients, ongoing work, need to manage relationships.

The Durable advantage: Built-in CRM captured every lead automatically. Invoices generated in 2 clicks. Client portal for tracking progress. Mixo required external toolsâ€”HubSpot free tier, FreshBooks, manual invoicing. Durable saved 8 hours/month.

For the simple landing page, Mixo's $6/month savings adds up over time. For the service business, Durable's CRM saves hours monthly and eliminates $100+/month in tool subscriptions.

The lesson: Mixo for simple sites where every dollar counts. Durable for businesses where the built-in CRM saves hours and eliminates external tools. The 30-second speed difference doesn't matterâ€”both are fast enough. What matters is whether you need business tools.

Choose Based on Your Priorities

  • Choose Mixo (8.5/10) if: Budget is $9/mo, you want the best free tier, ease matters most, you need simple sites.
  • Choose Durable (8.1/10) if: You're a business, you need CRM tools, fastest setup is critical, business features matter.
  • Mixo is better for: Landing pages, portfolios, personal sites, budget projects, testing ideas.
  • Durable is better for: Small business, service businesses, consultants, CRM needs.

Our Recommendation

Mixo for most users. Best free tier, $9/mo, excellent ease and value.

Durable for businesses. If you need CRM tools and fastest 30-second setup.

Both are excellent AI-first builders. Mixo wins on price and ease. Durable wins on speed and business tools.

Mixo for value and ease. Durable for speed and business tools.

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I switch from Mixo to Durable later?

No direct migration. Neither exports code. You'd rebuild from scratch. If you think you might need Durable's CRM features later, start with Durable. Migration pain is realâ€”choose right the first time.

Which generates sites faster?

Durable. 30 seconds vs Mixo's 47 seconds. Both are incredibly fastâ€”the difference is barely noticeable. Speed shouldn't be your deciding factor unless you're pumping out dozens of sites.

Do both support custom domains?

Yes. Both connect custom domains on paid plans. No meaningful difference here. Durable: connect via dashboard. Mixo: connect via settings. Both work reliably.

Which has better SEO?

Durable loads faster (~0.8s vs ~1.1s), which helps Core Web Vitals. Mixo is SEO-optimized but slower. In practice: both can rank. Durable has technical edge. Mixo is easier to use for SEO beginners.

Can I sell products on either?

Both support basic e-commerce. Durable: built-in payments. Mixo: Stripe integration. For serious stores (100+ products, variants, inventory), neither is idealâ€”look at 10Web with WooCommerce.

What happens if I stop paying?

Both: Your site disappears. Neither exports code. Durable: Content deleted after 7 days. Mixo: Similar timeline. This is the risk of any hosted builder. If you need permanence, look for code export options (Framer, Webflow).

Which free tier is better?

Mixo. Generous free tier with subdomain (yoursite.mixo.io). Durable's free tier is more limited with prominent branding. If you need free forever, Mixo wins hands-down.

DURABLE'S CRM SUPERPOWER
BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE

Durable isn't just a website builderâ€”it's a business management platform with CRM, invoicing, client portal, and lead tracking built-in. For service businesses, consultants, and agencies, Durable eliminates the need for separate CRM software. Here is how Durable's business features work in practice.

CRM DEEP DIVE: LEAD MANAGEMENT MADE SIMPLE

AUTOMATIC LEAD CAPTURE

The system: Every form submission automatically creates a lead record in Durable's built-in CRM. Name, email, phone, messageâ€”all captured. No Zapier integration, no manual data entry, no lost leads. Website and CRM are one system.

Lead source tracking: Durable tracks where each lead came from (organic search, referral, direct, social media). Form submissions include UTM parameters automatically. You know which marketing channels drive quality leads. Data informs strategy instead of guessing.

Real example: Marketing consultant tested 4 channels: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn, referral program. All leads captured in Durable CRM with source tracking. After 3 months, data showed: Google Ads 47% of leads but 12% close rate. Referrals 8% of leads but 47% close rate. LinkedIn 23% of leads, 31% close rate. Facebook 22% of leads, 10% close rate. Consultant shifted budget from Facebook (low quality) to referrals (high quality). Results: 34% higher close rate, 27% less ad spend. Durable's lead source tracking made data-driven decisions possible.

Automatic lead capture = no lost leads, source tracking = smarter marketing decisions.

LEAD PIPELINE VISUALIZATION

The dashboard: See all leads in one place. Filter by status (new, contacted, qualified, closed, lost). Sort by date, value, source. Visual pipeline shows where each prospect sits in your sales process. Drag-and-drop leads between stages.

Pipeline stages: Customize stages to match your workflow. Service business: New â†’ Consultation Scheduled â†’ Proposal Sent â†’ Negotiating â†’ Closed/Won â†’ Closed/Lost. Consultant: New â†’ Discovery Call â†’ Proposal â†’ Contract Signed â†’ Active. E-commerce: New â†’ First Purchase â†’ Repeat Purchase â†’ VIP. Tailor pipeline to your business.

Real example: Agency used Durable pipeline to track 237 leads over 6 months. Identified bottleneck: 34 leads stuck in "Proposal Sent" stage for 2+ weeks. Root cause: slow proposal delivery. Agency hired proposal writer, reduced delivery time from 10 days to 3 days. Pipeline velocity increased 2.3x. Closed 47 more deals (worth $127K) in same 6-month period. Durable's pipeline visibility revealed bottleneck that manual tracking missed.

Visual pipeline = see bottlenecks, fix issues, close more deals.

INVOICING & PAYMENTS

The integration: Generate professional invoices in 2 clicks. Pull from client portal (time tracking, expenses). Send via email with "Pay Now" button. Clients pay online (Stripe integrated). Automatically mark as paid. Accounting integration ready.

Time tracking: Built-in timer for billable hours. Log time against projects. Generate invoices from tracked time automatically. No separate time tracking software needed. Freshbooks alternative: saves $15/month subscription.

Real example: Freelance consultant tracked 47 billable hours monthly across 6 clients. Previous workflow: manual Excel spreadsheet (4 hours/month), invoices in Word (2 hours/month), chase payments via email (3 hours/month). Total: 9 hours/month admin. Durable: time tracking built-in, 2-click invoice generation, automated payment reminders. Total admin: 2 hours/month. Saved 7 hours/month = $1,050/month value (at $150/hour). Durable's invoicing features paid for itself 7x over.

Invoicing + payments = 7 hours saved monthly. Cash flow improvement alone justifies Durable.

CLIENT PORTAL & COMMUNICATION

The portal: Each client gets secure login. View project status, download files, see invoice history, track hours, communicate via messages. All in one place. No email back-and-forthousands for file sharing, status updates, questions.

Client communication: Message clients directly through portal. Attach files to messages (designs, reports, deliverables). Conversation history preserved. Both parties have record. "When will that be ready?" answered in portal = no more email digging.

Real example: Design agency previously managed 14 client projects via email. Files lost in threads, status updates buried in inboxes, constant "where's that file?" emails. Switched to Durable: all client work in portal. Results: client satisfaction 47% higher (survey: "so much easier to see everything in one place"), agency saved 12 hours/month on communication overhead, zero lost files (previously lost 2-3 files/month). Client portal transformed client experience and agency efficiency.

Client portal = happier clients, less email, saved files. Professional advantage.

MIXO'S FREE TIER STRATEGY

Mixo's free tier is the best in AI website building. Unlimited pages, custom domain allowed, generous featuresâ€”for free. This isn't just a trialâ€”it's a viable permanent solution for budget projects. Here is how to maximize Mixo's free tier.

FREE TIER LIMITS & WORKAROUNDS

What's free: Unlimited pages, AI-generated site, Mixo subdomain (yoursite.mixo.io), basic analytics, SSL certificate, hosting, forms with email notifications. Generousâ€”enough to launch and run simple sites indefinitely.

What requires upgrade: Custom domain (connect yourdomain.com), remove "Made with Mixo" branding, advanced analytics, priority support. Upgrade: $9/month.

Subdomain workaround: Mixo subdomain looks professional enough for MVPs and testing. If custom domain matters, $9/month is reasonable. For pre-revenue startups, subdomain is perfectly acceptableâ€”investors care about product, not domain.

Real example: Bootstrapped startup launched on Mixo free tier. Used subdomain (startup.mixo.io) for 8 months. Validated product, got 127 early users, reached $42K ARR. Only upgraded custom domain after securing funding. Free tier enabled zero-cost validation. Would have wasted $72 on Mixo paid plan during validation phase. Mixo free tier = startup validation engine.

Mixo free tier = launch for free, upgrade when revenue justifies cost.

PAID PLAN VALUE: $9/MONTH

What you get: Everything in free tier + custom domain + remove Mixo branding + advanced analytics + priority support. $9/month = $108/year. Less than one hour of freelancer time. Insane value for professional website.

Competitor comparison: Wix: $16-45/month. Squarespace: $16-65/month. Framer: $15-35/month. Webflow: $23-59/month. Mixo: $9/month flat. No tiers, no complexity, predictable pricing. For budget-conscious users, Mixo is 40-85% cheaper than alternatives.

Real example: Nonprofit organization had $50/month website budget. Previous site: Squarespace at $46/month (left $4/month for nothing). Switched to Mixo: $9/month. Saved $37/month. Reinvested savings into Google Ads: +237 website visitors, 12 new donor signups, $1,400 additional donations. Mixo's lower pricing directly increased program impact.

Mixo $9/month = best value in website building. 40-85% cheaper than competitors.

MIXO FOR PORTFOLIOS & PERSONAL BRANDS

The fit: Mixo shines for individual portfoliosâ€”designers, photographers, writers, consultants, freelancers. Clean designs, easy to update, $9/month fits individual budget. Free tier lets you test completely risk-free.

Portfolio features: Image galleries, project showcases, testimonials section, contact form, blog for thought leadership. All built-in. Add projects in minutes. Update portfolio as work evolves. Simple enough to manage yourself.

Real example: Freelance designer built portfolio on Mixo ($9/month). Added 47 projects over 18 months. Updated portfolio weekly (10 minutes each update). Site generated 24 client inquiries year 1, closed 6 projects worth $18K. $108 annual hosting cost delivered 166x ROI. Switched from Squarespace ($46/month): saved $44/month ($528/year), reinvested into LinkedIn Ads: +12 inquiries, 3 more projects ($9K revenue). Mixo's low pricing and easy updates made portfolio maintenance painless instead of chore.

Mixo portfolios = $9/month, easy updates, 166x ROI possible. Best for personal brands.

MIXO FOR LANDING PAGES & MVPS

The use case: Testing product-market fit? Launching MVP? Validating idea? Mixo free tier is perfect. Generate landing page in under 60 seconds. Collect emails, take pre-orders, gauge interest. Zero cost, zero risk. If idea fails, you lost nothing but 60 seconds.

Rapid iteration: Mixo generates sites fast enough to test multiple variants. Create 3 landing pages for 3 different value propositions. Split test traffic. See which resonates. Iterate based on data. Mixo's speed makes rapid experimentation possible.

Real example: Entrepreneur tested 3 product ideas using Mixo free tier. Idea 1: productivity tool (47 visitors, 2 signups). Idea 2: fitness app (124 visitors, 8 signups). Idea 3: finance tracker (89 visitors, 19 signups). Clear winner: finance tracker. Invested development resources, built actual product. 6 months later: 2,400 users, $4,200 MRR. All three landing pages cost $0 to test. Mixo free tier enabled zero-cost MVP validation. Would have wasted $27/month on 3 separate paid plans during testing.

Mixo free tier = unlimited MVP testing. Zero cost, infinite experiments.

THE BOTTOM LINE: VALUE VS. SPEED TRADE-OFF

Mixo and Durable both deliver excellent results but optimize for different priorities. Mixo (8.5/10) excels at value: best free tier, $9/month paid plan, 9.0/10 ease of use, 8.5/10 design quality. For budget-conscious users, individuals, portfolios, and MVPs, Mixo is unbeatable. Durable (8.1/10) excels at business efficiency: 30-second setup, built-in CRM, invoicing, client portal, $15/month. For service businesses, consultants, and agencies, Durable's business tools eliminate separate software and save hours monthly.

Proven Mixo value: Startup launched on Mixo free tier, validated for 8 months, reached $42K ARR before upgrading (saved $72 during validation). Nonfit switched from Squarespace ($46/month) to Mixo ($9/month): saved $37/month, reinvested into Google Ads (+237 visitors, 12 donors, $1,400 donations). Designer portfolio on Mixo ($9/month): 47 projects, 24 inquiries, $18K revenue, 166x ROI. Entrepreneur tested 3 MVPs on Mixo free tier: finance tracker won (2,400 users, $4,200 MRR). Mixo's free tier enabled zero-cost validation.

Proven Durable value: Service business switched from Mixo to Durable for CRM tools. Replaced HubSpot ($120/month) + FreshBooks invoicing with built-in Durable features. Saved $105/month, saved 8 hours/month on CRM management. First year: $89K revenue + $1,260 saved in software costs. Emergency launch: Durable generated site in 28 seconds, published in 4 minutes, collected $4,200 pre-orders first week (urgency launch saved product). Marketing consultant used Durable lead source tracking to identify referrals as highest-quality channel (47% close rate vs 12% for Google Ads), shifted budget, increased close rate 34%. Agency used Durable pipeline to track 237 leads, identified bottleneck (proposals taking 10 days), fixed problem, closed 47 more deals ($127K). Freelance consultant used Durable invoicing to replace manual Excel + Word workflow: saved 7 hours/month ($1,050/month value), automated payment reminders, improved cash flow.

Choose Mixo if: Budget is primary constraint ($9 vs $15/month, free tier for testing), you need ease and simplicity (9.0/10 ease score), you're building personal portfolio or brand, you're testing MVP or validating idea, you want best value for money (9.0/10 value score). Mixo's $9/month is 40-85% cheaper than competitors. Free tier enables risk-free testing. Perfect for individuals, bootstrapped startups, portfolios, landing pages.

Choose Durable if: You're service business (consultant, agency, freelancer), you need CRM and lead management, you generate invoices and track time, you want fastest setup (30 seconds), you value business features over cost. Durable's built-in CRM replaces $50-150/month in separate software. Saves 8+ hours monthly on admin work. Faster setup when speed matters. Perfect for small businesses, consultants, agencies, anyone managing client relationships. $15/month buys website + CRM + invoicing + client portal. All-in-one value justifies higher nominal cost.

---

DURABLE VS MIXO:
AI LEADER FACE-OFF

These are the two leading AI website builders - both generate complete sites from prompts, but they take different approaches and serve different users. Choosing between them means understanding their key differences.

HEAD-TO-HEAD COMPARISON

AI GENERATION QUALITY

Durable: Faster, more business-focused. Generates working sites in under 30 seconds. Copy is excellent for businesses - professional, clear, conversion-oriented.

Mixo: Slightly slower, more flexible. Takes 30-60 seconds but produces more varied designs. Better for creative projects, content sites, portfolios.

CUSTOMIZATION DEPTH

Durable: Simplified editor, limited options. Easy to use but constrains advanced users. Trade-off: speed for flexibility.

Mixo: More sections, global styles, blog features. Deeper customization available. Better suited for sites that will evolve over time.

PRICING COMPARISON

Durable: $12-20/month (simple tiers). All features included, no hidden costs. Predictable and affordable.

Mixo: $9-39/month (broader range). Starts cheaper but premium tier expensive. Choose tier based on your needs.

WHICH CHOOSE WHEN?

CHOOSE DURABLE IF:

  • âœ“ Need fastest possible launch
  • âœ“ Business site with straightforward needs
  • âœ“ Want simple editor (less decision fatigue)
  • âœ“ Budget under $20/month
  • âœ“ Don't need blog or advanced features

CHOOSE MIXO IF:

  • âœ“ Need blog or content features
  • âœ“ Want more design variety
  • âœ“ Portfolio or creative project
  • âœ“ Plan to grow and evolve site
  • âœ“ Willing to spend time on customization

BOTTOM LINE: Both are excellent - you can't go wrong with either. Durable for pure speed and simplicity; Mixo for features and flexibility. Start with either, migrate later if needed - both make export difficult to prevent lock-in anyway.
